stories.Title: Etched: The hardware for superintelligence
stories.Description: This San Francisco-based startup aims to achieve 100x the performance at a fraction of the cost with their specialized chips solely dedicated to running large language models.
stories.Tweet: Etched: The hardware for superintelligence 📦 This San Francisco-based startup aims to achieve 100x the performance at a fraction of the cost with their specialized chips solely dedicated to running large language models. #ai https://etched.ai/

stories.Title: AI is the must-have condiment in Google's menu
stories.Description: With the help of generative AI, the company hopes to integrate artificial intelligence into advertising, automate ad processes, and provide personalized suggestions to creators.
stories.Tweet: AI is the must-have condiment in Google's menu 📦 With the help of generative AI, the company hopes to integrate artificial intelligence into advertising, automate ad processes, and provide personalized suggestions to creators. #google https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/17/google-to-use-new-ai-models-for-ads-and-to-help-youtube-creators.html

stories.Title: ServiceNow teams up with Nvidia
stories.Description: Both companies have plans to collaborate and build super-specialized generative AI models for enterprise functions, beginning with IT workflows.
stories.Tweet: ServiceNow teams up with Nvidia 📦 Both companies have plans to collaborate and build super-specialized generative AI models for enterprise functions, beginning with IT workflows. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/servicenow-partners-with-nvidia-to-develop-super-specialized-generative-ai-for-enterprises/

stories.Title: The future of food delivery
stories.Description: Brace yourselves for a high-tech experience at your nearest fast-food chain as Wendy's currently pilots an underground delivery system powered by autonomous robots.
stories.Tweet: The future of food delivery 📦 Brace yourselves for a high-tech experience at your nearest fast-food chain as Wendy's currently pilots an underground delivery system powered by autonomous robots. #robotics https://www.theverge.com/2023/5/17/23727631/wendys-robots-tunnels-underground-food-delivery

stories.Title: A breakthrough for neurotechnology
stories.Description: Bringing the future to our daily lives, neurotech startup Paradromics is developing a groundbreaking brain implant to restore communication for individuals with severe paralysis.
stories.Tweet: A breakthrough for neurotechnology 📦 Bringing the future to our daily lives, neurotech startup Paradromics is developing a groundbreaking brain implant to restore communication for individuals with severe paralysis. #science https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/18/brain-implant-company-paradromics-one-step-closer-to-fda-approval.html

stories.Title: Latest news from the cosmos!
stories.Description: Astronomers have stumbled upon an extraordinary exoplanet, LP 791-18 d, which may have volcanic activity similar to Jupiter's moon Io.
stories.Tweet: Latest news from the cosmos! 📦 Astronomers have stumbled upon an extraordinary exoplanet, LP 791-18 d, which may have volcanic activity similar to Jupiter's moon Io. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/nasa-s-spitzer-tess-find-potentially-volcano-covered-earth-size-world

stories.Title: Carbon removal meets innovation
stories.Description: Frontier-backed startup, Charm Industrial, is revolutionizing carbon removal with its groundbreaking "bio-oil" technology, converting agricultural waste into a sustainable solution.
stories.Tweet: Carbon removal meets innovation 📦 Frontier-backed startup, Charm Industrial, is revolutionizing carbon removal with its groundbreaking "bio-oil" technology, converting agricultural waste into a sustainable solution. #startups https://www.fastcompany.com/90897922/carbon-removal-startup-sends-oil-back-undergroundand-just-got-53-million-in-contracts

stories.Title: More bumps in the road for Apple’s Reality Pro
stories.Description: According to reports, the device falls short of the company's initial vision, raising concerns among top executives. Will Apple carry on with the announcement at next month’s WWDC?
stories.Tweet: More bumps in the road for Apple’s Reality Pro 📦 According to reports, the device falls short of the company's initial vision, raising concerns among top executives. Will Apple carry on with the announcement at next month’s WWDC? #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/05/18/reality-pro-headset/

stories.Title: Copilot is better than ever
stories.Description: GitHub's machine learning experts continually work to improve how Copilot contextualizes your code, enabling seamless collaboration between developers and the AI pair programmer.
stories.Tweet: Copilot is better than ever 📦 GitHub's machine learning experts continually work to improve how Copilot contextualizes your code, enabling seamless collaboration between developers and the AI pair programmer. #GitHub https://github.blog/2023-05-17-how-github-copilot-is-getting-better-at-understanding-your-code/

stories.Title: Langdock: Effortless plugins
stories.Description: This open-source platform is ready to be your go-to partner for developing, testing, and monitoring Large Language Model (LLM) plugins.
stories.Tweet: Langdock: Effortless plugins 📦 This open-source platform is ready to be your go-to partner for developing, testing, and monitoring Large Language Model (LLM) plugins. #programming https://www.producthunt.com/posts/langdock

stories.Title: No more cookies for you!
stories.Description: Google is now saying goodbye to third-party cookies, starting in early 2024. 1% of Chrome users will experience the new privacy-conscious approach.
stories.Tweet: No more cookies for you! 📦 Google is now saying goodbye to third-party cookies, starting in early 2024. 1% of Chrome users will experience the new privacy-conscious approach. #google https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/18/google-will-disable-third-party-cookies-for-1-of-chrome-users-in-q1-2024/
